page.title: 06A DAY: IN LIFE OF A WORKER
page.content: My father is a local odd job builder and live in an interesting cottage which has needed much renovation.He needs to have a car and a van.He leaves the car at home for our mother to drive us to school for our route is along the A 40 and parts of it have no foot-paths whilst he goes to work in the van which carries his tools, etc. needed for the various jobs.These jobs can vary from doing repairs on churches to helping to repair chicken sheds.Transport costs are high for it may be necessary for him to travel considerable distances to undertake work.Many jobs are in places along muddy and stony tracks.He used to play football and go to Track Races or go elvering in the Severn Estuary but this is only possible on weekends for his hours are long during the week-days.
